trans-unit.source: Abstract base class that represents a light object that has a position in space and projects its light in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 抽象基类，该类表示在空间中具有位置以及项目中所有方向其 light 的光对象。

trans-unit.source: The rate at which the light's intensity diminishes over distance is determined by its range and attenuation properties.
trans-unit.target: 由其范围和衰减属性确定显示光亮度随距离的速率。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a constant value by which the intensity of the light diminishes over distance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置远距离的光强度降低所依据的常量值。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Double by which the intensity of the light diminishes over distance.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值所依据的光强度随距离减弱。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the linear diminution of the light's intensity over distance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定随距离光强度线性减弱。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the linear diminution of the light's intensity over distance.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，指定线性减弱的光强度随距离。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> that specifies the light's position in world space.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> ，它指定在全局空间中的光源的位置。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> that specifies the light's position in world space.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>它指定在全局空间中的光源的位置。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.Position*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.Position*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.Position*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the diminution of the light's effect over distance, calculated by a quadratic operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定随距离，计算由二次操作显示光效果的减弱。

trans-unit.source: The QuadraticAttenuation property is the coefficient of the square of the distance.
trans-unit.target: QuadraticAttenuation 属性是平方的距离的系数。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the diminution of the light's effect over distance, calculated by a quadratic operation.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，指定随距离，计算由二次操作显示光效果的减弱。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance beyond which the light has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置光产生任何影响最大距离。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the distance beyond which the light has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，指定光产生任何影响最大距离。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.Range*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.Range*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.Range*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。
